text: Brandon is a former commune. It is in Bourgogne-Franche-Comté in the Saône-et- Loire department in east France. On 1 January 2019, it was merged into the new commune of Navour-sur-Grosne.Arrêté préfectoral 13 November 2018 == References == Category:Former communes in Saône-et-Loire
title: Brandon, Saône-et-Loire
